hanzi-su-wiki:
彙

Значения

Коллекция, однородные предметы; набор, подборка

Мнемоника

Еж с мордочкой как у свиньи 彑. Зарывается под покров 冖 земли, а на колючки накалывает плоды 果. В переносном смысле: собирать (на иголки), как ёж.

Варианты

匯, 汇, 彚

heisig_chinese_memo: We mutually ended the relationship because she used all of the money for her crown collection with you picked fruit to survive. &nbsp
heisig_constituent: glossary, broken broom, mutual, crown, fruit, rice field, brains, tree, wood, broom*
heisig_story: The top primitive of this character is actually an old form of broom. The remaining elements are: crown . . . fruit.
koohiiStory1: People who read the glossary are mutually exclusive (exclude the top line of mutually (#757) ) from those who eat crowned fruit イ はりねずみ same kind 語彙.
koohiiStory2: I was having mutual difficulties in my relationship. She was always the one wearing the crown and I was the one picking the fruit. In order to fix the problem I checked the glossary for "mutual difficulties" but found nothing. I guess we´re going to have to mutually end our relationship.

humanum_full_description_en:
From "㣇", " stomach " save the sound. The original meaning is hedgehog. "Er Ya. "Shi Beast": "hui, burr." Xing Bingshu: "hui is a hedgehog, its hair is like needles." And "Shu Wen": "hui, insects are like porcupines. From 㣇, the stomach saves the sound. Hedgehog, or From the insects." Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Zhongshan Jing": "There is a beast yan, its shape is like a sink, and its red is like a pill fire. Its name is 𤟑, and it is a national epidemic." Later, it is often written as " hedgehog " or " hedgehog " to indicate the meaning of hedgehog.

" Sink " also means class and category. Such as "Tai Xuan. "Zhou": "Yang Qi Zhou Shen is opposite to the beginning, and things follow their confluence." Sima Guang's note: "Everything follows its kind and regenerates." Tang Dynasty Han Yu "Gan Chun" "Fortunately, Yao and Shun Ming four eyes, organized All products are suitable." "Finance" refers to varieties and categories.

Hedgehogs have a large number of burrs on their bodies, so they use " convergence " and "collection" to compare the gathering of many similar species. (See Wang Fengyang) Such as "Song History. "Shihuo Zhi": "Where the law of paddy fields and official fields, the public fields are seen in history, the beginning and the end are summarized in the chapter, and those who have sufficient lessons." "Drafts of Qing History. "Wang Ji Biography": "Speak to the president, first imitate Song Li Tao's long compilation, gather the edicts, memorials, and diaries, so that all historical materials are available." There is also a writing "Hedgehog Collection", such as "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 70: "Because of the approaching age, the Zhuwu Hedgehog Collection is not an exception. Lin Zhixiao has opened a list of people. There are a total of eight 25-year-old singles who should marry a wife and set up a house. The girls are good for assignments." " Hui " extends the meaning of gathering, which is similar to " hui ". The simplified word merges both "汇" and "汇" into "汇". See " Exchange ".
humanum_short_description_en: From "㣇", " stomach " saves the sound. The original meaning is hedgehog.
humanum_full_description:
從「㣇」，「胃」省聲。本義是刺蝟。《爾雅．釋獸》：「彙，毛刺。」邢昺疏：「彙即蝟也，其毛如針。」又《說文》：「彙，蟲似豪豬者。从㣇，胃省聲。蝟，或从虫。」如《山海經．中山經》：「有獸焉，其狀如彙，赤如丹火，其名曰𤟑，見則其國大疫。」後多寫作「蝟」或「猬」表示刺蝟義。

　　「彙」也表示類、類別。如《太玄．周》：「陽氣周神而反乎始，物繼其彙。」司馬光注：「萬物各繼其類而更生也。」唐代韓愈〈感春〉「幸逢堯舜明四目，條理品彙皆得宜。」「品彙」即品種和類別。

　　刺蝟身上有大量毛刺，故又以「彙」、「彙集」比喻眾多同類的聚集。（參王鳳陽）如《宋史．食貨志》：「凡水田、官田之法，公田見於史者，彙其始末而悉載于篇，有足鑒者焉。」《清史稿．汪楫傳》：「言於總裁，先仿宋李燾長編，彙集詔諭、奏議、邸報之屬，由是史材皆備。」亦有寫作「猬集」，如《紅樓夢》第70回：「因又年近歲逼，諸務猬集不算外，又有林之孝開了一個人名單子來，共有八個二十五歲的單身小廝應該娶妻成房，等裏面有該放的丫頭們好求指配。」「彙」引申出聚集義，與「匯」意義相近。簡化字把「彙」和「匯」都歸併到「汇」。參見「匯」。
humanum_short_description: 從「㣇」，「胃」省聲。本義是刺蝟。

語彙(ごい): vocabulary, glossary

從「 㣇 」，「 胃 」省聲。本義是刺蝟。《爾雅．釋獸》：「彙，毛刺。」邢昺疏：「彙即蝟也，其毛如針。」又《說文》：「彙，蟲似豪豬者。从㣇，胃省聲。蝟，或从虫。」如《山海經．中山經》：「有獸焉，其狀如彙，赤如丹火，其名曰𤟑，見則其國大疫。」後多寫作「 蝟 」或「 猬 」表示刺蝟義。 「 彙 」也表示類、類別。如《太玄．周》：「陽氣周神而反乎始，物繼其彙。」司馬光注：「萬物各繼其類而更生也。」唐代韓愈〈感春〉「幸逢堯舜明四目，條理品彙皆得宜。」「品彙」即品種和類別。 刺蝟身上有大量毛刺，故又以「 彙 」、「彙集」比喻眾多同類的聚集。（參王鳳陽）如《宋史．食貨志》：「凡水田、官田之法，公田見於史者，彙其始末而悉載于篇，有足鑒者焉。」《清史稿．汪楫傳》：「言於總裁，先仿宋李燾長編，彙集詔諭、奏議、邸報之屬，由是史材皆備。」亦有寫作「猬集」，如《紅樓夢》第70回：「因又年近歲逼，諸務猬集不算外，又有林之孝開了一個人名單子來，共有八個二十五歲的單身小廝應該娶妻成房，等裏面有該放的丫頭們好求指配。」「 彙 」引申出聚集義，與「 匯 」意義相近。簡化字把「 彙 」和「 匯 」都歸併到「 汇 」。參見「 匯 」。
From " 㣇", " stomach" save the sound. The original meaning is hedgehog. "Er Ya. "Shi Beast": "hui, burr." Xing Bingshu: "hui is a hedgehog, its hair is like needles." And "Shu Wen": "hui, insects are like porcupines. From 㣇, the stomach saves the sound. Hedgehog, or From the insects." Such as "Shan Hai Jing. "Zhongshan Jing": "There is a beast yan, its shape is like a sink, and its red is like a pill fire. Its name is 𤟑, and it is a national epidemic." Later, it is often written as " hedgehog" or " hedgehog" to indicate the meaning of hedgehog. " Sink" also means class and category. Such as "Tai Xuan. "Zhou": "Yang Qi Zhou Shen is opposite to the beginning, and things follow their confluence." Sima Guang's note: "Everything follows its kind and regenerates." Tang Dynasty Han Yu "Gan Chun" "Fortunately, Yao and Shun Ming four eyes, organized All products are suitable." "Finance" refers to varieties and categories. Hedgehogs have a large number of burrs on their bodies, so they use " convergence" and "collection" to compare the gathering of many similar species. (See Wang Fengyang) Such as "Song History. "Shihuo Zhi": "Where the law of paddy fields and official fields, the public fields are seen in history, the beginning and the end are summarized in the chapter, and those who have sufficient lessons." "Drafts of Qing History. "Wang Ji Biography": "Speak to the president, first imitate Song Li Tao's long compilation, gather the edicts, memorials, and diaries, so that all historical materials are available." There is also a writing "Hedgehog Collection", such as "A Dream of Red Mansions" Chapter 70: "Because of the approaching age, the Zhuwu Hedgehog Collection is not an exception. Lin Zhixiao has opened a list of people. There are a total of eight 25-year-old singles who should marry a wife and set up a house. The girls are good for assignments." " Hui" extends the meaning of gathering, which is similar to " hui". The simplified word merges both " 汇" and " 汇" into " 汇". See " Exchange".

［《廣韻》于貴切，去未，云。］
“彚1”的新字形。“汇2”的繁体字。
(1)类；族类。
(2)繁盛。
(3)汇聚。
(4)刺蝟。
